items.content: South Korean police have arrested a CEO and five employees for manufacturing over 240,000 satellite receivers pre-loaded or later updated to include DDoS attack functionality at a purchaser's request. [...]

items.creator: Sergiu Gatlan
items.title: Russia sentences Hydra dark web market leader to life in prison
items.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
items.content: Russian authorities have sentenced the leader of the criminal group behind the now-closed dark web platform Hydra Market to life in prison. [...]
items.contentSnippet: Russian authorities have sentenced the leader of the criminal group behind the now-closed dark web platform Hydra Market to life in prison. [...]

items.creator: Bill Toulas
items.title: BootKitty UEFI malware exploits LogoFAIL to infect Linux systems
items.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
items.content: The recently uncovered 'Bootkitty' UEFI bootkit, the first malware of its kind targeting Linux systems, exploits CVE-2023-40238, aka 'LogoFAIL,' to infect computers running on a vulnerable UEFI firmware. [...]
items.contentSnippet: The recently uncovered 'Bootkitty' UEFI bootkit, the first malware of its kind targeting Linux systems, exploits CVE-2023-40238, aka 'LogoFAIL,' to infect computers running on a vulnerable UEFI firmware. [...]

items.creator: Mayank Parmar
items.title: Mozilla really wants you to set Firefox as default Windows browser
items.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
items.content: In an effort to turn the tide, Mozilla is testing a fresh approach that could persuade more people to switch their default browser on Windows during the installation of the browser. [...]
items.contentSnippet: In an effort to turn the tide, Mozilla is testing a fresh approach that could persuade more people to switch their default browser on Windows during the installation of the browser. [...]
